movies.overview: Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit enjoying his quiet life, is swept into an epic quest by Gandalf the Grey and thirteen dwarves who seek to reclaim their mountain home from Smaug, the dragon.
movies.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey

movies.overview: The Dwarves, Bilbo and Gandalf have successfully escaped the Misty Mountains, and Bilbo has gained the One Ring. They all continue their journey to get their gold back from the Dragon, Smaug.
movies.original_title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
movies.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug

movies.overview: This third film in the series follows a group of marine biologists attempting to capture a young great white shark that has wandered into Florida's Sea World Park. However, later it is discovered that the shark's 35-foot mother is also a guest at Sea World. What follows is the shark wreaking havoc on the visitors in the park.
movies.title: Jaws 3

movies.overview: The sequel to the successful blockbuster Jaws. An American horror thriller from 1978 about a great white that brings fear to everyone near the water. The film used it’s predecessor’s success to achieve it’s own and was not directed by Steven Spielberg.
movies.title: Jaws 2

movies.overview: Two divers find a treasure map, which apparently points to a sunken treasure below the ocean. They hire a professional to help them get the gold but this guy turns out to have a few secrets of his own.
movies.original_title: Ein toter Taucher nimmt kein Gold
movies.title: Deadly Jaws

movies.overview: After another deadly shark attack, Ellen Brody decides she has had enough of New England's Amity Island and moves to the Caribbean to join her son, Michael, and his family. But a great white shark has followed her there, hungry for more lives.
movies.title: Jaws: The Revenge

movies.overview: A tiger shark bred by the Navy as a killing machine is wrecking havoc in the sleepy tourist town of Hampton Bay.
movies.title: Cruel Jaws

movies.overview: In a post apocalyptic Canada, the jawbone of the majestic moose has become the most coveted form of barter due to it's capabilities as a multi-purpose tool and weapon. One moose has had enough. The great white north is about to be reclaimed by nature.
movies.title: Moose Jaws

movies.overview: A bankrupt studio schemes the government to finance a sexploitation mermaids film. Casting couches thus join the already exploitive studio. Meanwhile, the Secretary of State arranges an affair with the studio head's buxom wife Henrietta.
movies.title: Deep Jaws

movies.overview: An unofficial documentary commentary on the making of Steven Spielberg's JAWS (1975)
movies.title: Inside Jaws

movies.overview: Two parallel tales about two modern women. One is Štefica Cvek, average and lonely girl who desperately tries to find the man of her dreams. The other story is about a woman director who is making the movie about Štefica and has the same problem.
movies.title: In the Jaws of Life

movies.overview: A preacher whose ancestors were Druids battles Satan, who has taken the form of a huge snake.
movies.title: Jaws of Satan
